On weekends, the user would disable the recurring alarm but sometimes ask the assistant to set a one-time alarm for a later time, such as 10:30 AM, if he had plans or appointments scheduled. He valued the flexibility to adjust the alarm time based on his changing schedule.

In rare instances when the user overslept or missed his alarm, he would express frustration and ask the assistant to analyze the issue, such as checking for potential conflicts or system glitches. The user's interactions with the assistant were generally straightforward and focused on the core functionality of setting and managing alarms. He preferred a concise and efficient communication style, with clear confirmations and minimal unnecessary prompts or small talk.
